nodes.text: Big Quince was an individual who worked with the Wookiee smuggler Chewbacca in a weapons trade on Orelon. During the weapons trade, he acquired the pirate Maz Kanata's Smuggler's Guide from Big Quince's Wookiee bodyguard and kept the book without mentioning it to his parter, Han Solo, for several months. After learning the story, Solo recorded the information of how Chewbacca acquired it in the Smuggler's Guide.
Big Quince was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, written by Daniel Wallace.
